articles.title: Fintech stocks are 'maturing' in their later stages, Dave is one
articles.mainIdea: Fintech stocks are 'maturing' in their later stages, Dave is one
articles.summary: Yahoo Finance Video: Fintech stocks are 'maturing' in their later stages, Dave is one. How will the Federal Reserve's interest rate environment in 2026 affect fintech stocks? Benchmark Company managing director and senior research analyst of fntech and digital assets Mark Palmer shares his outlook on financial technology companies, such as neobank Dave Inc. (DAVE) and the state of its short-term loans business. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Opening Bid. Related tickers mentioned: DAVE.

articles.title: 2026 outlook: Big Banks are getting back their 'earnings mojo'
articles.mainIdea: 2026 outlook: Big Banks are getting back their 'earnings mojo'
articles.summary: Yahoo Finance Video: 2026 outlook: Big Banks are getting back their 'earnings mojo'. Major bank stocks are poised to close 2025 with serious gains; most notably, Citigroup shares (C) are already up 67% while Goldman Sachs (GS) has surged 57% (or nearly $330) year-to-date. Whalen Global Advisors founder and chairman Chris Whalen — alongside TPW Advisory founder Jay Pelosky — speaks with Market Catalysts host Julie Hyman about his consensus on the banking sector heading into 2026, citing various corporate credit risks amid the Federal Reserve's current interest rate environment. Also catch Yahoo Finance Senior Banking Reporter David Hollerith and Hennion & Walsh CIO Kevin Mahn discuss the 2026 outlook for regional banks. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts. Related tickers mentioned: BAC, C, GS, JPM, MS, MS-PQ, WFC.
